item.title: (PI) (INSIDIAX SOURCE) Theiving stall help
item.dc:creator: @scared_kid scared kid
item.description:
@scared_kid wrote:

ok i added

case 4874:
c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 400000, 1);
break;
case 4875:
c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 1000000, 99);

but when i use the theif stall i only gives me 1 coin!!?
where can i fix the problem

  1. what file do i go to fix it
  2. the code i used above was actionhandler.java

Read full topic
